original_text: And now you have gone away because you longed greatly for your father's house, but why did you steal my gods?”
korean_text: 이제 네가 네 아버지 집을 사모하여 돌아가려는 것은 옳거니와 어찌 내 신을 도둑질하였느냐

sentences.original_text: And now you have gone away
because you longed greatly for your father's house
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 아버지 집을 몹시 그리워했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: but why did you steal my gods?”
